messages.subject: DHs in trades, was Re: Laundry Is Fun
messages.msgSnippet: ... I had to laugh at this one. My husband is in the cleaning business. He cleans big corporate aircraft belonging to very rich mucky-mucks, and apparently
messages.messageBody:
> From: Kerry Kibort <kkibort@...>
> Dont do anything drastic, yet. My husband is a
> carpenter, and every part of my house is 1/2 finished.
> He does beautiful work when paid, but here its more of
> a hapless hobby, so beware! I hear this happens to
> lots of women who think they have found the perfect
> tradesman(husband,lol)


I had to laugh at this one. My husband is in the cleaning business. He
cleans big corporate aircraft belonging to very rich mucky-mucks, and
apparently does an awesome job of it (he even got asked to clean Martha
Stewart's plane :-)
When asked to clean the bathroom at home, he swabs the washcloth around the
sink once or twice. Arrrrgh! Where is that spotless attention to detail he's
so famous for???

:-)

Blue Skies!
-Robin-
Mom to Mackenzie (8/28/96) "This is a great life!"
and Asa (10/5/99) Who walks backwards
http://www.geocities.com/the_clevengers Flying Clevenger Family
